Class PayrollSystem

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.PayrollSystem
public class PayrollSystem extends Object
The PayrollSystem class is responsible for handling payroll-related operations including adding pay claims, generating payslips, calculating tax, and saving payslips to a CSV file

  • Method Details

    • addPayClaim

      public boolean addPayClaim(int staffId, double hoursWorked)
      Adds a payClaim for a part-time employee
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the staff member submitting the payClaim
      hoursWorked - The number of hours worked by the employee
      Returns:
      True if the payClaim is successfully added, false otherwise

    • generateMonthlyPayslips

      public ArrayList<Payslip> generateMonthlyPayslips()
      Generates monthly payslips for all staff members
      Returns:
      A list of payslips for all staff members

    • generatePayslipForEmployee

      public Payslip generatePayslipForEmployee(Staff staff)
      Generates a payslip for a specific employee
      Parameters:
      staff - staff member for whom the payslip is to be generated
      Returns:
      generated payslip for the employee, or null if the payslip cannot be generated

    • generateAndPrintPayslips

      public void generateAndPrintPayslips()
      Generates and prints payslips for all employees.
